item.title: Samba over Tailscale/Wireguard
item.description: I recently found out about Tailscale, a control plane for WireGuard. I decided to revisit an old project of mine and use it to set up a Samba server on an long ignored dedicated server so that I could access my videos remotely. However, the process proved to be more challenging than I had anticipated. Goal The goal was to access my videos from the server via my Windows PC and Android phone, while also ensuring that the data was secure in transit, and not accessed by others.
